def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_large = is_large(x, ctx) and is_large(y, ctx)
        check_xy_dark = is_dark(x, ctx) and is_dark(y, ctx)
        check_x_below_six = is_below(x, None, ctx) and is_middle(x, None, ctx)
        check_y_right_three = is_right(y, None, ctx) and is_middle(y, None, ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_large
            and check_xy_dark
            and check_x_below_six
            and check_y_right_three
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results
